email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is quite low given current market conditions. I can offer $49.00 per metric ton, which is competitive. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.00 is closer to our target. Can we meet in the middle at $47.25 per metric ton? Also, can we extend the laytime to 96 hours? Looking forward to your response. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your flexibility. I can agree to $47.25 per metric ton and extend the laytime to 96 hours. Demurrage remains at $20,000 per day pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your help. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great! I’ll send over the draft shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
